description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Dissertation on the Pageants or Dramatic Mysteries anciently performed at Coventry, by the trading companies of that city: chiefly with reference to the vehicle, characters, and dresses of the actors. ... To which are added, the Pageant of the Shearmen & Taylors' Company, etc. L.P" Author: SHARP, Thomas - Antiquary Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 644.m.8.", "British Library HMNTS L.R.255.d.8.", "British Library HMNTS G.501." Page: 142 Place of Publishing: Coventry Date of Publishing: 1825 Publisher: Merridew Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003357963 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
